DOC.detailed_description: From Sept 2009 Dec 2012 , recruit consecutive patient hematological disease undergo allogeneic stem cell transplantation 5 institution China . Recipients age 14 60 year old eligible . Eligible patient randomize receive daily subcutaneous 5-7μg/kg/d GM-CSF ( Molgramostim , TOPLEUCON® ; Xiamen Amoytop Biotech Co. , Ltd. , China ) ( GM-CSF group ) , 5-7μg/kg/d G-CSF ( G-CSF group ) , combination 2-3μg/kg/d GM-CSF 2-3μg/kg/d G-CSF ( G-CSF+GM-CSF group ) . Administration CSFs start day 5 post-transplant continued recovery neutropenia ( absolute neutrophil count [ ANC ] > 1.5×10 ( 9 ) /L 2 consecutive day ) . If absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) decrease < 1.5×10 ( 9 ) /L within 5 day withdrawal CSFs , CSF would resume absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) reach 1.5×10 ( 9 ) /L . All patient receive antimicrobial prophylaxis oral levofloxacin 500 mg daily antifungal prophylaxis oral fluconazole 200 mg daily .
